# Function

```{r}
add <- function(x,y) {
  x+y
}
```

```{r}
add(2,3)
```

```{r}
add(c(2,3),4)
```

```{r}
calc <- function(x,y,type) {
  if(type=="add") {
    x+y
  } else if(type=="minus") {
    x-y
  } else if(type=="multiply") {
    x*y
  } else if(type=="divide") {
    x/y
  } else {
    stop("Unknown type of operation")
  }
}
```

```{r}
calc(2,3,"minus")
```

```{r}
calc(c(2,5),c(3,6),"divide")
```
